title: Dog healed of cancer
cleaned_text: Last winter when we took our dog, Pepper, to get a vaccination required by law in our state, the vet told us she wanted to hospitalize him and take some tests. She thought he had a serious problem.

opengraph.title:
Dog healed of cancer
 - The Christian Science Journal
